subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: An in place proven strategy  and fully accepted of environmental management in indigenous territories (IT) for Indigenous Peoples (IP) is adopted for the effective conservation and sustainable use of forest biodiversity
subproject.title: BRA/09/G32 - Indigenous Lands
